html: Instead of misusing taxpayer dollars to try to deliver on a fanciful and far-fetched campaign promise, President @realDonaldTrump should be directing his Administration to tackle the real problems that our country faces.
text: Instead of misusing taxpayer dollars to try to deliver on a fanciful and far-fetched campaign promise, President @realDonaldTrump should be directing his Administration to tackle the real problems that our country faces.

html: We also shouldn’t waste another second without reorienting our national priorities to mitigate climate change — which will devastate our nation’s coastline, weaken our economy and threaten our national security.
text: We also shouldn’t waste another second without reorienting our national priorities to mitigate climate change — which will devastate our nation’s coastline, weaken our economy and threaten our national security.

html: Every single day, millions of families across the country struggle to find affordable addiction treatment for loved ones suffering from the opioid crisis. We should be focusing our national efforts and resources on saving lives and ending this terrible epidemic.
text: Every single day, millions of families across the country struggle to find affordable addiction treatment for loved ones suffering from the opioid crisis. We should be focusing our national efforts and resources on saving lives and ending this terrible epidemic.

html: We can have an economy that lifts up middle-class families, raises wages and offers good-paying jobs – not give trillions of dollars in tax cuts and giveaways to millionaires, billionaires and corporations. #HR1 #ForThePeople

html: And when Members of Congress pay attention to the small donors – to the everyday people – we can bring about the change that Americans across the country want to see.

html: I am deeply saddened by the horrific anti-Semitic attack that took place in Pittsburgh this morning. My heartfelt condolences go out to the victims, their families, the entire Tree of Life congregation, the City of Pittsburgh and the American Jewish community.

html: If the Trump Administration can afford a $1.5 trillion tax cut for millionaires, billionaires and wealthy corporations, then it can certainly afford a modest and hard-earned pay bump for the women and men who honorably serve our country.
text: If the Trump Administration can afford a $1.5 trillion tax cut for millionaires, billionaires and wealthy corporations, then it can certainly afford a modest and hard-earned pay bump for the women and men who honorably serve our country.

html: “If anyone would like to come out and honor the victims of this tragedy, I encourage you to join us at a series of vigils this evening.
text: “If anyone would like to come out and honor the victims of this tragedy, I encourage you to join us at a series of vigils this evening.

html: "Anyone who may have valuable information about yesterday’s incident should contact the Anne Arundel County Police homicide unit at (410) 222-4731. If you would like to remain anonymous, please call the Department’s 24-hour tip line at (410) 222-4700.
text: "Anyone who may have valuable information about yesterday’s incident should contact the Anne Arundel County Police homicide unit at (410) 222-4731. If you would like to remain anonymous, please call the Department’s 24-hour tip line at (410) 222-4700.

html: "I again encourage any individual or family member who needs help to call the Anne Arundel County Crisis ‘Community Warmline’ at (410) 768-5522.
text: "I again encourage any individual or family member who needs help to call the Anne Arundel County Crisis ‘Community Warmline’ at (410) 768-5522.

html: "We honor the courage of the Capital Gazette staff who were determined to press on and publish the newspaper today. They are a tribute to their profession and have quickly cemented the legacy of their lost colleagues.
text: "We honor the courage of the Capital Gazette staff who were determined to press on and publish the newspaper today. They are a tribute to their profession and have quickly cemented the legacy of their lost colleagues.

html: “We also cannot ignore that those targeted were members of our cherished free press who work tirelessly to keep us informed in a time of increasingly course and overheated political rhetoric.
text: “We also cannot ignore that those targeted were members of our cherished free press who work tirelessly to keep us informed in a time of increasingly course and overheated political rhetoric.

html: "The challenge is to find the political will to enact sensible and widely supported measures that will make our communities safer places to live.
text: "The challenge is to find the political will to enact sensible and widely supported measures that will make our communities safer places to live.

html: “It is inevitable that this terrible shooting will be pulled into the national debate over what we can do as a society to address gun violence. That’s fair and appropriate because clearly we must do more.
text: “It is inevitable that this terrible shooting will be pulled into the national debate over what we can do as a society to address gun violence. That’s fair and appropriate because clearly we must do more.

html: “I also want to reiterate my deep appreciation for the swift, heroic efforts of our first responders and law enforcement officials, who are continuing to conduct a thorough investigation of yesterday’s incident. They answered the call of duty with outstanding professionalism.
text: “I also want to reiterate my deep appreciation for the swift, heroic efforts of our first responders and law enforcement officials, who are continuing to conduct a thorough investigation of yesterday’s incident. They answered the call of duty with outstanding professionalism.

html: "And for those who are grieving, we will do whatever we can to help ease the impact of this traumatic experience.
text: "And for those who are grieving, we will do whatever we can to help ease the impact of this traumatic experience.

html: “As yesterday’s events continue to ripple through the Annapolis community, I want to again express my deepest sorrow to the families who lost their loved ones in this terrible tragedy. We will keep close the memory of Rob, Wendi, Gerald, John and Rebecca.
text: “As yesterday’s events continue to ripple through the Annapolis community, I want to again express my deepest sorrow to the families who lost their loved ones in this terrible tragedy.  We will keep close the memory of Rob, Wendi, Gerald, John and Rebecca.

html: Here's my latest statement regarding the shooting that took place at The Capital Gazette in Annapolis: https://sarbanes.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/sarbanes-statement-on-capital-gazette-shooting-updated-0 ….pic.twitter.com/ItzvlYdwTe

html: “Again, for those members of our community seeking information or in need of support, please call the Anne Arundel County Crisis ‘Community Warmline’ at (410) 768-5522.”

html: "Tonight, as the investigation continues, please remember today’s victims and their families.
text: "Tonight, as the investigation continues, please remember today’s victims and their families.

html: “I’ve had the privilege of knowing many reporters at The Capital Gazette over the years. I deeply admire their professionalism, their service to our community and their commitment to a vibrant, free and open press.
text: “I’ve had the privilege of knowing many reporters at The Capital Gazette over the years. I deeply admire their professionalism, their service to our community and their commitment to a vibrant, free and open press.

html: “Today’s violent events at The Capital Gazette are heart wrenching. As we work to process this tragedy, we should praise our first responders, whose swift and courageous actions prevented an even greater loss of life.

html: Right now our highest priority needs to be making sure the families of the victims have the information and support they need in this tragic time.

html: I am in contact with the federal agencies responding to the scene. My office has established lines of communication with the FBI and ATF to ensure that they have the resources they need to assist the Anne Arundel County Police Department.

.@RepSarbanes: Trump campaign had 90 times more ads approved than Clinton.
